Text: I had problems with mp4's not being in sync in all powerdvd 12 versions and on two different computers.I don't think this update will fix it,but I'll give it a try.Thanks for the upload.Your 	CyberLink PowerDVD 12.0.1514.54 ULTRA (Registered) [ChingLiu] worked great.I just uninstalled it for the powerdvd 11 though.Maybe by the end of the year powerdvd 12 will be as stable as powerdvd 11.
This version also drags the sound behind the video when playing mp4's.Thanks for the upload.I guess it back to powerdvd 11 for me.
Yeah your right the video does not sync with the audio. when watching a Hi Res Movie the voice has a bit delay.
